2 Tangents and Radius

Toolbar / Icon:
       
Menu: Draw - Circle - 2 Tangents and Radius
Shortcut: C, T, R
Commands: circletangent2radius | ctr

Description:

Draws a circle with a given radius that is tangential to two entities.

Procedure:

  1. Type the radius into the options tool bar.
  2. Specify the first tangential entity.
  3. Specify the second tangential entity.
